turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I was wondering if you could place a Pizza Hut order for me please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely! What size pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A large please, that should be enough for three of us don't you think?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think a large would be fine for three people. What would you like on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to go with a supreme, but can you ask them to replace the sausage with extra pepperoni?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course I can! Would you like to add anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all for today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I am about to place your order with Pizza Hut for one large supreme pizza with extra pepperoni instead of sausage. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome, your order will be ready for pickup in about 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You should receive your receipt any minute now via text message to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can do for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all for now but I will be in touch. Thank you for your help!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It was my pleasure! I hope you enjoy your dinner!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, I'm sure we will. I hope you have a great night!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you so much! I hope you do as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye.
